mapper.sql: a.logid AS "logid", a.category_id AS "category.logid", a.title AS "title", a.color AS "color", a.image AS "image", a.href AS "href", a.weight AS "weight", a.weight_date AS "weightDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.logid", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.logid", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", c.name AS "category.name", u.name AS "user.name"
JOIN cms_category c ON c.logid = a.category_id JOIN sys_user u ON u.logid = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_link( logid, category_id, title, color, image, href, weight, weight_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{logid}, #{category.logid}, #{title}, #{color}, #{image}, #{href}, #{weight}, #{weightDate}, #{createBy.logid}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.logid}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_link SET category_id = #{category.logid}, title = #{title}, color = #{color}, image = #{image}, href = #{href}, weight = #{weight}, weight_date = #{weightDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.logid}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE logid = #{logid}
